welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Higham Ferrers, a charming town known for its historical beauty and warm community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here. Enjoy your time in Higham Ferrers!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a login is required to access the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
